00026 // lbann_callback .hpp - Base class for LBANN callbacks
00028 
00029 #ifndef __LBANN_CALLBACKS_CALLBACK_HPP_INCLUDED
00030 #define __LBANN_CALLBACKS_CALLBACK_HPP_INCLUDED
00031 
00032 #include "lbann/lbann_base.hpp"
00033 #include "lbann/utils/lbann_summary.hpp"
00034 #include "lbann/models/lbann_model.hpp"
00035 #include "lbann/layers/lbann_layer.hpp"
00036 
00037 namespace lbann {
00038 
00046 class lbann_callback {
00047 public:
00049   lbann_callback(int _batch_interval = 1,
00050                  lbann_summary* _summarizer = nullptr) :
00051     batch_interval(_batch_interval), summarizer(_summarizer) {}
00052   void set_summarizer(lbann_summary* _summarizer) { summarizer = _summarizer; }
00054   virtual void setup(model* m) {}
00056   virtual void on_train_begin(model* m) {}
00058   virtual void on_train_end(model* m) {}
00060   virtual void on_epoch_begin(model* m) {}
00062   virtual void on_epoch_end(model* m) {}
00064   virtual void on_batch_begin(model* m) {}
00066   virtual void on_batch_end(model* m) {}
00068   virtual void on_test_begin(model* m) {}
00070   virtual void on_test_end(model* m) {}
00072   virtual void on_validation_begin(model* m) {}
00074   virtual void on_validation_end(model* m) {}
00076   virtual void on_forward_prop_begin(model* m) {}
00078   virtual void on_forward_prop_begin(model* m, Layer* l) {}
00080   virtual void on_forward_prop_end(model* m) {}
00082   virtual void on_forward_prop_end(model* m, Layer* l) {}
00084   virtual void on_backward_prop_begin(model* m) {}
00086   virtual void on_backward_prop_begin(model* m, Layer* l) {}
00088   virtual void on_backward_prop_end(model* m) {}
00090   virtual void on_backward_prop_end(model* m, Layer* l) {}
00091 
00093   const int batch_interval;
00094 protected:
00096   lbann_summary* summarizer;
00097 };
00098 
00099 }  // namespace lbann
00100 
00101 #endif  // __LBANN_CALLBACKS_CALLBACK_HPP_INCLUDED
